entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
